name: The Midnight Wind
description:
The Midnight Wind is a sarcastic single-player pixel art RPG following the story of four hosts of the souls of a dead star. The story loosely takes place in Indonesia, where players will embark on a bare-bones journey to protect themselves and their people. The four hosts are named Altara, Osmos, Nabur, and Torren Voldusaya, the bratty children of a royal family.

The game currently includes

- 90 different enemies to encounter
- 50 different weapons and armors to equip
- 5 characters to play as including an unlockable character
- Approximately 10 hours of gameplay
- 150+ different items to collect
- "Interesting" dialogue

Current version 1.0.3 Beta
